page.title: 08A FISHY BUSINESS
page.content:
Mr Clark's fishshop is situated opposite the harbour. It is the only fish business left in Fisherrow. Fishing boats used to land fish at the harbour regularly and the Co-op garage used to be the fish market several years ago.
Here are some questions the group asked Mr Clark
Have fish stocks declined over the years. Yes, unfortunately they have declined drastically.
How much does a box of Haddock cost now compared to 15 years ago. Now Haddock cost Â£36 a box but then it only cost Â£6-Â£7 in new money.
Is this still a profitable industry. Yes if you are prepared to work at it.
